meanings: Noun 구식 또는 격식 (특히 덩치가 크고 위험한) 짐승, 야수
Noun 비격식, 흔히 유머 싫은[불쾌한] 사람[것]
Agustin Luna is the definition of a BEAST!he goes so hard he makes straight guys go gay.he shits on the whole world like hes was ghandi!haha
One who calls himself a beast of the internet, one who thinks he's best of all and knows all about /b/.

A man amongst boys. You can't stop them, you can only hope to contain them. A dude who can hardly be classified as human, because of his beastliousness. Someone who likes to be hit. Whatever you try to do to him will just make him stronger.

examples.korean: Music has charms to soothe the savage beast, to soften rocks, or bend a knotted oak. (William Congreve) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 음악은 야만인의 가슴을 쓰다듬고, 돌을 무르게 하며, 옹이진 나무를 휘게 하는 매력을 지녔다. (윌리엄 콩그리브, 음악명언) 명언/속담
